result.arabic_text: قُلۡ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَٰمِلٞۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Emwe bantu narungitsweko! Nimukore ivyo mugira vyose nk’uko muvyipfuza mu gusenga ibigirwamana ata co bishoboye, jewe mu vy’ukuri nkora ivyo nkora, nisunze amabwirizwa y’Imana Allah, bitebe bitebuke rero muzomenya;
